Plot: While drying out on the West Coast, an alcoholic hit man befriends a tart-tongued woman who might just come in handy when it's time for him to return to Buffalo and settle some old scores.
Title: You Kill Me
Actors: Ben Kingsley, Téa Leoni, Luke Wilson, Dennis Farina
tomatoConsensus: Featuring wonderful performances from Ben Kingsley and Tea Leoni, You Kill Me is a charming, funny take on the familiar inner-lives-of-hit-men premise.
